Dearborn_Heights.WCAR:
WCAR is a 24-hour sports radio station based out of Livonia, Michigan. The station is an affiliate of SB Nation Radio.


== History ==
For the history of the radio station formerly known as WCAR 1130 AM from 1939 to 1978, see WDFN.
1090 AM was originally WERB in Garden City, Michigan, co-owned with the now-defunct WBRB 1430 AM in Mount Clemens and airing a full-service middle of the road/contemporary music format aimed at the western suburbs of Wayne County.
